Header: Motor accident in Madagascar claims three Sri Lankans lives
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st):- Three Sri Lankans died in a motor accident in Madagascar. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that the unfortunate incident occurred last night (November 1). The three victims died as a result of their vehicle falling into a river. The bodies were discovered and retrieved by the Madagascar police. The bodies currently lie at a hospital in Madagascar. The Ministry stated that the High Commissioner for Sri Lanka in Seychelles is probing into more information about the incident.
